description: A strong man that dresses up like a sister. He`s 29 years-old and is British. On the right side of his face is a scar. Every Sunday he`ll hold a mass that lasts only a few second in the church under the bridge. Under his robe is a military suit. He was formerly a soldier and carries a lot of weapons. He is in love with http://anidb.net/ch15160 [Maria] who he met during the last war he was in. Surprisingly he is good with making cookies and other sweets.
name: Sister
